casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.
v.
BURD 2017-0279 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 21, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. Kennedy and Piper, JJ., dissent. Robin N. Piper, J., of the Twelfth District Court of Appeals, sitting for O'Donnell, J. Charles M. Miller, J., of the First District Court of Appeals, sitting for DeGenaro, J.
